priorVersion.title: CDISC SEND Microscopic Findings Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89974

self.title: CDISC SEND Microscopic Findings Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology for the test codes concerned with the findings from a specimen that are visible by microscopic analysis.
name: Microscopic Findings Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Microscopic Findings Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: A measurement of the abnormal cells in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the beta-defensin 2 in a biological specimen.
A measurement of BRCA1 protein in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Breast Cancer Type 1 Susceptibility Protein Measurement

terms.definition: A relative measurement (ratio or percentage) of the neoplastic cells to total cells in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the cytokeratin 16 in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the dendritic cell-lysosomal-associated membrane protein in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Dendritic Cell Lysosomal-Associated Membrane Protein Measurement

terms.definition: A measurement of estrogen receptor protein in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of fibrosis in a biological specimen.
A measurement of HER2 protein in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 Measurement

terms.definition: A measurement of the Ki-67 protein in a biological specimen.
A measurement of lipocalin-2 in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of lymphatic invasion in a biological specimen.
An assessment by microscope (e.g., light, electron, confocal, etc.).
A measurement of NK2 homeobox 1 protein in a biological specimen.
A relative measurement (ratio or percentage) of the normal cells to total cells in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Normal Cell to Total Cell Ratio Measurement

terms.definition: A relative measurement (percentage) of in situ component present in a carcinoma compared to the entire malignant cellular proliferation. (NCI)
An evaluation of perineural invasion in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the progesterone receptor protein in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the S100 calcium binding protein A7 in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: S100 Calcium Binding Protein A7 Measurement

terms.definition: The determination of the presence of actual or potential neoplastic tissue which has been left outside the boundary of a resected specimen within the patient. (NCI)
A relative measurement (ratio or percentage) of the stromal cells to total cells in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Stromal Cell to Total Cell Ratio Measurement

terms.definition: The dimension between two surfaces of an object, usually the smallest dimension as opposed to the width or the length.
A relative measurement (ratio or percentage) of the tumor cells to total cells in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Tumor Cell to Total Cell Ratio Measurement

terms.definition: An evaluation of vascular invasion in a biological specimen.
